definition: Najaf (city in Iraq, a Shia holy city)
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: The policemen were from the southern Shi'ite city of Najaf.
sentences.chinese: 遭到伏擊的警察來自南部什葉派城市納傑夫。

sentences.english: A senior police official in Najaf said several of his men were missing.
sentences.chinese: 納傑夫市一位高級警官說，他手下有幾名警察失蹤。
